title: Search CostClicks Performance Metrics

xdm:clicks.title: Clicks
xdm:clicks.description: Total number of clicks on your ads or keywords.

xdm:impressions.title: Impressions
xdm:impressions.description: Total number of impressions on your ads or keywords.

xdm:totalCost.description: Total Spend on your ads or keywords.

xdm:pos.title: Ad Position
xdm:pos.description: Position of the Ad displayed on Search Engine.
